<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataCV extends data { const CODE = 'CV'; const PREFIX = 238; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[2-59]\d\d|800)\d{4}', ); const TYPES = array( '2(?:2[1-7]|3[0-8]|4[12]|5[1256]|6\d|7[1-3]|8[1-5])\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:[34][36]|5[1-389]|9\d)\d{5}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{4}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
